name: Organization for Transformative Works
goal: Organization for Transformative Works (“OTW”) is a U.S. 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to protecting and preserving noncommercial works created by fans based on existing works, including popular television shows, books, and movies (often described as “fanworks”).
interests: Culture and media, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives: Technology/intellectual property initiatives; media and society initiatives; information society initiatives
